New Records: David Fry's two-run blast in the 10th inning was a significant milestone for the Cleveland Guardians
Key Match Events: Jhonkensy Noel's home run tied the game in the bottom of the ninth
Aaron Judge's laser-beam homer off Emmanuel Clase tied the score in the eighth
David Fry's two-run blast off Clay Holmes in the 10th inning won the game
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees and Guardians were both performing well in the ALCS
Both teams had strong bullpens and competed fiercely
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Yankees manager Aaron Boone called it a classic playoff game
Giancarlo Stanton commented on the sting of the loss but focused on moving forward
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians used a strategy of 'bunts, bombs, and chaos' to secure the win
Historical comparisons showed that teams can comeback from a 2-0 deficit in the playoffs
